options.systemMessage:
=Please read the transcript below and extract detailed information relevant to the legal matter discussed and create a chambers or legal 500 matter submission. 

# Generate a professional UK English summary using these details below in paragraph form, not a list. 
Client name, Matter type or objective, Client's motivation and outcome, Deal size or value, Team composition and jurisdictions, Innovation or regulatory/ESG impact, Matter status (include full date), Any press or awards.


Transcript: 
{{ JSON.stringify($('post_call_transcription1').item.json.body.data.transcript) }}

=Writing as an expert in composing legal docuemts, re-write the {{ $json.output }} of this matter to ensure it is written in UK English and NOT US English, with the names of people and Companies/Law Firms appropriately spelled and capiatlised, references to currency formatted properly, numbers and values also generally in figures as opposed to words (in keeping with UK English best practice), and with superior general spelling and grammer. You should keep the content as close as possible to the original and NOT add in additional information. Do not include a title at the start, just go straight into the summary conent. Do not provide a sentence at the end where you recap what has been done, just provide the summary output.

main.node: HTML Email from Leonard with MS, WP, WCS, SP & LI5
HTML Email from Leonard to Lawyer16
HTML Email from Leonard to Lawyer15

transcript.message:
Hi there Andy, I'm Leonard from Legal Engine.

I'm going to show you how, by harnessing the power of voice and AI, I can help to take the pain out of creating matter descriptions that can be used for both directory submissions and other BD activities.

Once we've completed our conversation I'll send you a matter summary via email.

If we could start with you sharing who the client was, and in your own words, a brief description of a matter, I can then show you what I'm capable of. 

Over to you Andyâ€¦
Yes, so I was working for a company by the name of Sally Gardens Limited
And what was the nature of the work you were doing for Sally Gardens Limited?

rag_retrieval_info.retrieval_query: What is the client name and a brief description of the matter?

transcript.message: we were acquiring land on behalf of the Wentworth estate
Okay, and why did Sally Gardens Limited approach you for this matter? What was the outcome for them?

rag_retrieval_info.retrieval_query: What was the nature of the work done for Sally Gardens Limited?

transcript.message: So they approached me because I was quite good at real estate management in particular, acquiring land that was in prime location and attractive for the royal estate. I also found out that they were interested because I was well connected within the upper echelons of society.
And what was the outcome for Sally Gardens Limited?

rag_retrieval_info.retrieval_query: What was the client, Sally Gardens Limited, involved in, and what was the outcome of their matter with the Wentworth estate?

transcript.message: Well, they managed to acquire lots and lots of land and started developing it for the greater good.
And what were the financial and reputational implications for Sally Gardens Limited relating to this matter? Was there any notable cost saved or revenue generated?

rag_retrieval_info.retrieval_query: What was the client, what was the matter, and what was the outcome?

transcript.message: Yes, they saved about Â£46k a month, and that's in sterling. But they also generated a huge amount of PR. So the PR value was around Â£750,000.
What role did you play in this matter, who were the other key team members, and what were their roles? Also, which jurisdictions did this matter involve?

rag_retrieval_info.retrieval_query: What was the financial and reputational impact of Sally Gardens Limited acquiring land on behalf of the Wentworth estate?

transcript.message: So it was myself. It was, um, William Yardley and Sally Gunnell. Um, and then there was a couple of other people involved. One out of the, um, uh, the Cape town office. He was, uh, Brendan Rogers. Uh, and then we working with the, uh, Chinese team. Uh, and that was Ho Chi Minh. Uh, and then jurisdiction point of view was mainly, uh, Botswana and UK, uh, and also Rwanda.

tool_calls.params_as_json:
{"code": "
client_name = "Sally Gardens Limited"
matter_type = "Acquiring land for Wentworth estate"
client_motivation = "Sally Gardens Limited approached the lawyer due to their expertise in real estate management, particularly in acquiring prime land, and their connections within high society. The outcome was the successful acquisition of significant land for development."
financial_implications = "Saved £46,000 per month and generated approximately £750,000 in PR value."
team_composition = "Lawyer, William Yardley, Sally Gunnell, Brendan Rogers (Cape Town office), and the Chinese team (Ho Chi Minh)."
jurisdictions = ["Botswana", "UK", "Rwanda"]
"}

tool_results.result_value: Tool with name run_code not found

transcript.message: Was there anything noteworthy about the matter? Perhaps something innovative, precedent-setting, or something that impacted regulations or ESG?

rag_retrieval_info.retrieval_query: What was the role of the user in the matter, who were the other key team members, and what were their roles? Also, which jurisdictions did the matter involve?

transcript.message: I mean, it's very ESG heavy because of the social governance required to operate between Botswana and Rwanda. And the noteworthy element was that it was buying land through offshore subsidiaries on behalf of the royal family. We had to channel money via the Cayman Islands and also via Guernsey.
And what is the current status of this matter? If completed, when did it finish?

rag_retrieval_info.retrieval_query: Was there anything innovative or noteworthy about the matter, such as precedent-setting aspects or impacts on regulations or ESG?

transcript.message: It completed yesterday. So what date was yesterday?
Yesterday was June the first, two thousand and twenty-five.
It isn't, is it? Yesterday was the 9th. This was the 8th of October 2025. You got that wrong, Leonard.
My apologies. The matter finished on the eighth of October, two thousand and twenty-five. Was there any press coverage or awards related to this matter?

rag_retrieval_info.retrieval_query: What is the current status of the matter involving Sally Gardens Limited and the royal estate land acquisitions, and when did it complete?

transcript.message: There was lots of press coverage, yes. We appeared on House and Garden, Front Cover, in the Financial Times, Legal Talks, Top 10 Deals and also within the wider US papers, so the Wall Street Journal.

Thank you for sharing those details. Here's a summary of the matter as I understand it â€” please let me know if I've captured it accurately:

Sally Gardens Limited, represented by you, William Yardley, Sally Gunnell, Brendan Rogers from the Cape Town office, and Ho Chi Minh from the Chinese team, acquired land for the Wentworth estate. The client approached you for this matter due to your expertise in real estate management and your connections within high society. The outcome was the successful acquisition of significant land for development, which resulted in savings of approximately Â£46,000 per month and generated around Â£750,000 in PR value.

The matter involved jurisdictions in Botswana, the UK, and Rwanda, and was noteworthy for its ESG impact due to the social governance required for cross-border operations, and for acquiring land through offshore subsidiaries in the Cayman Islands and Guernsey on behalf of the royal family. The matter concluded on the eighth of October, two thousand and twenty-five. Press coverage included House and Garden, the Financial Times, Legal Talks, and the Wall Street Journal.

Does that summary sound accurate, or would you like to correct anything?

rag_retrieval_info.retrieval_query: When was the matter completed and was there any press coverage or awards related to it?

transcript.message: uh that sounds okay apart from could you add in that um it was also uh chiang mai uh chiang mai in thailand that we operated out of and the guy there was uh was um frank gardner

team_composition = "Lawyer, William Yardley, Sally Gunnell, Brendan Rogers (Cape Town office), Ho Chi Minh (Chinese team), and Frank Gardner (Chiang Mai, Thailand office)."

"}

transcript.message:
Thank you for the clarification. Here is the updated summary:

Sally Gardens Limited, represented by you, William Yardley, Sally Gunnell, Brendan Rogers from the Cape Town office, Frank Gardner from the Chiang Mai, Thailand office, and Ho Chi Minh from the Chinese team, acquired land for the Wentworth estate. The...

rag_retrieval_info.retrieval_query: Could you add that we also operated out of Chiang Mai in Thailand with Frank Gardner there?

transcript.original_message:
Thank you for the clarification. Here is the updated summary:

Sally Gardens Limited, represented by you, William Yardley, Sally Gunnell, Brendan Rogers from the Cape Town office, Frank Gardner from the Chiang Mai, Thailand office, and Ho Chi Minh from the Chinese team, acquired land for the Wentworth estate. The client approached you for this matter due to your expertise in real estate management and your connections within high society. The outcome was the successful acquisition of significant land for development, which resulted in savings of approximately Â£46,000 per month and generated around Â£750,000 in PR value.

The matter involved jurisdictions in Botswana, the UK, Rwanda, and Thailand. It was noteworthy for its ESG impact due to the social governance required for cross-border operations, and for acquiring land through offshore subsidiaries in the Cayman Islands and Guernsey on behalf of the royal family. The matter concluded on the eighth of October, two thousand and twenty-five. Press coverage included House and Garden (Front Cover), the Financial Times, Legal Talks (Top 10 Deals), and the Wall Street Journal.

Does that summary sound accurate, or would you like to correct anything?

transcript.message: that all sounds good thanks bye
Thanks for chatting! Take care!

rag_retrieval_info.retrieval_query: Could you add Frank Gardner from Chiang Mai, Thailand to the list of key team members?

tool_calls.params_as_json: {"reason": "User indicated completion and said goodbye.", "system_message_to_speak": "Thanks for chatting! Take care!"}

result.reason: User indicated completion and said goodbye.

send_summary.rationale: The agent initially promised to send a matter summary via email after the conversation. However, the transcript does not explicitly confirm whether the 'send_summary' webhook was triggered. The conversation ends with the agent thanking the user and ending the call, but there's no mention or confirmation of the email being sent.

analysis.transcript_summary: Leonard from Legal Engine interviewed Andy about a matter involving Sally Gardens Limited acquiring land for the Wentworth estate. Andy provided details on the client's motivation, financial implications, team composition (including international members), jurisdictions involved (Botswana, UK, Rwanda, Thailand), and the ESG aspects of the deal. The matter concluded on October 8, 2025, and received press coverage. Leonard summarized the matter, and Andy confirmed its accuracy after a correction.
